char **  eof 
)

Definition at line 35 of file sutils.h.

{
  char *ret;

  ret = skip_spaces( line );
  if (*ret == '\0') {
    *eof = ret;
    return 0;
  }
  *eof = skip_non_spaces( ret );
  return ret;
}

                                                  {
  char *r;

  r = malloc( to - from + 1 );
  if (!r) {
    return 0;
  }

  strncpy( r, from, to - from  );
  r[ to - from ] = '\0';
